name: Energy Core
description:
Your core has to both shoot the enemy spaceships, and regenerate the shield. It can't do both. You need to choose between offense and defense to survive the infinite waves of enemies.

Directions

WASD or arrow keys to move, space bar to place down and pick up the core turret. When the turret isn't deployed, you regenerate health. 

Health Bar and Enemy Score not showing?

Try to make it full screen to see everything.

Try to get the highest score possible!(I didn't add a high score system, ran out of time. Might add it in a post-jam version.)
